channel.title: CVE Feed for AMD -- Ryzen™ 3000 series Desktop Processors “Matisse"
channel.description: The latest CVEs for AMD -- Ryzen™ 3000 series Desktop Processors “Matisse"

item.title: CVE-2022-23820|2024-06-18T18:28:41.324Z -- amd -- ryzen%E2%84%A2%203000%20series%20desktop%20processors%20%E2%80%9Cmatisse%22
item.description: Failure to validate the AMD SMM communication buffer may allow an attacker to corrupt the SMRAM potentially leading to arbitrary code execution.

item.title: CVE-2023-20533|2024-06-18T18:34:28.851Z -- amd -- ryzen%E2%84%A2%203000%20series%20desktop%20processors%20%E2%80%9Cmatisse%22
item.description: Insufficient DRAM address validation in System Management Unit (SMU) may allow an attacker to read/write from/to an invalid DRAM address, potentially resulting in denial-of-service.

item.title: CVE-2021-46774|2024-06-18T18:31:43.449Z -- amd -- ryzen%E2%84%A2%203000%20series%20desktop%20processors%20%E2%80%9Cmatisse%22
item.description: Insufficient DRAM address validation in System Management Unit (SMU) may allow an attacker to read/write from/to an invalid DRAM address, potentially resulting in denial-of-service.
